price: 75. Allahas pasirenka Pasiuntinius iš angelų ir iš žmonių tarpo. Iš tiesų, Allahas yra Visa Girdintis, Visa Matantis.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَصۡطَفِي مِنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلٗا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaṣṭafī mina al-malāikati rusulan wamina al-nāsi inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
